nodes.text: Sal Olbeg's estate was located on the outskirts of Rytal Prime on the moon Dayark. A large estate, it also operated as a farm. The marshy grounds were arranged into neat squares separated by dikes and tended to by agricultural droids. The main building was a glass-domed structure raised up out of the water on pilings, and surrounded by a stone wall. The water was filtered and heated, and made an ideal outside swimming pool.
